data.title: Notice Regarding Temporary Cannabis Events
data.excerpt: Please be aware that lawful participation by bureau licensees in any temporary cannabis event that allows sales and/or consumption is dependent upon issuance of the appropriate licenses from the bureau.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
